comments.content: It looks like **[Eurostile (Bold/Black Extended)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418170050/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Eurostile%20BQ%20-%20Bold%20Extended&fid=d258e36db6340f517145f80d3aaea6cc&fsize=60&text=03%20BAY%20LUNAR&wrap=2)** available from many foundries
